name: 2022 7th International Conference on Green Energy Technologies
content: Paper Publishing: Papers submitted to the conference, after the peer reviewing process, will be published into ICGET 2022 Conference Proceedings in Energy Reports (ISSN: 2352-4847) to be indexed by Science Citation Index Expanded, Ei Compendex & Scopus, Directory of Open Access Journals (DOAJ). Journal Metrics with Impact Factor: 6.87.
